Package net.trajano.mojo.batik

Batik Maven Plugin.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FontConverterMojo
    Executes the Batik Font converter.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on batik-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn batik:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    RasterizerMojo
    Executes the Batik rasterizer.

Package net.trajano.mojo.batik Description

Batik Maven Plugin. Provides functionality to execute the Batik Rasterizer and Font converter.
